meanings.definition: The act of sending goods or materials from one place to another.
meanings.sent1: The company handles many shipments every day.
meanings.sent2: The shipments arrived at the warehouse on time.
meanings.sent3: The shipments decided to take a detour and explore the countryside.
meanings.sent4: Her love for travel was like a series of shipments, always moving forward.
meanings.sent5: The colorful packages of shipments filled the room with excitement.

meanings.definition: A quantity of goods or materials sent.
meanings.sent1: He received multiple shipments of books for his bookstore.
meanings.sent2: The store manager checked the inventory of incoming shipments.
meanings.sent3: The cat knocked over the box of shipments, creating a mess.
meanings.sent4: The idea was a shipment of hope in a time of despair.
meanings.sent5: The shipments of fresh fruit brought a burst of fragrance to the market.
